p: Cytotoxicity evaluated on human fibroblast (MRC5) showed an IC 50 of 35 µM for 8 g that is lower than for fluconazole or voriconazole (IC 50 >100 µM). Nevertheless, its cytoxicity occurred at concentration 280-time higher than geometric mean MIC against Candida (while fluconazole and voriconazole toxicity index were > 15 and > 590, respectively).
